analysis.key_quote: At its core, this rule doesn’t strengthen the civil service—it weakens it. It makes federal statistical agencies less credible, less effective, and more vulnerable to political pressure.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of federal statistical agencies, the potential loss of institutional knowledge, and the negative impact on employee morale and productivity, all of which align with a defense of the current merit-based civil service system.
